entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
